title: Due to reduction in the price of mangoes by 30%, a person got 15 mangoes more for the same amount. What is the number of mangoes originally purchased? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let the number of mangoes originally purchased be X at price of Rs 10 each cost =10X Reduced price at -30%=10*70/100=7 Number of mangoes now purchased=X+15 As the amount is same; 10X=7(X+15)=7X+105 3X=105 X=105/3=35 The number of mangoes originally purchased are 35
